TextAsset.value: How am I going to be helping, exactly?
(I... Need to take a deep breath here. Okay.)
Nidia... I think this is what Principal Dig Dug was talking about...
Not everyone is ready to just dive into something like that...especially when they don't know the details.
Is it really fair to try to involve someone in your destiny without being completely open with them?
There's nothing wrong with being direct, but I think you also need to be up front about the whole truth. Saving the world is a huge--
... I was going to say responsibility.
(Her destiny really bothers her for some reason... )
Anyway, what I'm trying to say is... If there's someone you have in mind, I can help you talk to them.
I'm no King of All Cosmos, but... Talking can be one of my good points.
Um... Did you have anyone in mind?
Tomari helped me put together a method for determining compatibility. He calls it the Tomari Personality Compatibility Matrix!
Using the matrix, I've narrowed it down to 3 people.
But he's good-looking! The only thing better than tall, dark and handsome is a man in glasses.
Oooh. She's so... Unapproachable. Do you think you have a chance?
I have my sources! And that cool, confident exterior... The strong, silent type is definitely attractive!
What does a person's appearance have to do with combining...
I know... My heart fluttered a little bit just thinking about that sleek, Allurium exterior...
Tell me about it... I should have worn my summer armor.........
OKAY! Let's get focused here. Where does Richard Miller usually hang out?
He's always where you least suspect him...
Now... I don't want to sound suspicious...
But I happened to be in the area...
And I thought I heard my name.
(Being behind a mystic veil in the biology section of the library isn't 'just happening to be in the area' you psycho!!)
We were just talking about you!
(He's writing furiously in a notebook... His pencil is a blur.)
(Nidia's checking her notes... Maybe these two ARE compatible.
They sure are studious, in their own ways.)
Richard... What do you think of me?
Everyone is suspicious until proven unsuspicious!
Ummm... What do I say to that?
I think he just needs to get to know you... Tell him about yourself.
Okay... Richard, do you believe in prophecy?
I suspect she's in... a shadowy cult...
What? No! I'm not in any cult!
Is this one of those prank shows, then?
Just the magic, all-seeing eye of my amulet. Which I can use to combine with another person... to become a dragon! I want your help!
Where's the rest of your cult?
That's just what someone in a cult would say!!
Do you see what I mean? Nobody likes me...
I wouldn't base your view of humanity on him if I were you...
We were just talking about your bike!
Ask her if she's free later! Keep it casual.
But just because I like fast motorcycles...
Doesn't mean I like fast relationships.
Relationship? Oh no! I think we're having two different conversations here.
.................. No one wants to combine with me......
Don't give up! I'm sure the next time will go better.
(WE'VE DEFINITELY SET OUR SIGHTS TOO HIGH)
Come on... Let's get this over with...
I think there's more going on here than I thought...
(Maybe this isn't such a good idea... )
EVERYONE WANTS A PIECE OF GALAGA... BECAUSE GALAGA IS MADE OF ALLURIUM, THE RAREST, MOST PASSIONATE METAL IN THE UNIVERSE.
BUT GALAGA IS NOT JUST SOME TROPHY, TO BE PRIZED LIKE AN OBJECT.
GALAGA HAS SEEN THINGS ON THE GALACTIC FRONTIER... DONE THINGS THAT YOU CANNOT IMAGINE.
YOU THINK GALAGA IS A THING, TO BE OWNED...
BUT YOU CANNOT OWN GALAGA'S EXPERIENCES.
GALAGA HAS FEELINGS TOO! GALAGA... HAS FEELINGS... TOO.
I just want to be alone for a while.
ONCE AGAIN... GALAGA BECOMES EMBROILED IN YOUR...
I just... I wanted to help, but I was no help at all.
I'm putting myself in SEPTUPLE SPIRIT DUNGEON DETENTION!
If I have to spend forever in detention, then I don't have to worry about some stupid prophecy!!!!!
BY THE COILS OF JÃRMUNGANDR... I should have put more points into charisma!!
